desc: Need React Native App Developers Build A Keep The Change APP.We need an app that will connect with [url removed, login to view] 's API to round up the transaction to the newest dollar amount and keep the change or difference. Then convert the change from the transaction to Credits that users of the app can use to make purchases at other merchants.So for example:userA > adds their credit card info to the app > the CC info is stored on the app >USER MAKES A PURCHASE:user goes to the store and buys something > user will be able to use the app to buy products from merchants (merchant will scan the app for the transaction) for $5.40 > the app will connect to Omnivore's API and connect to the POS system and pay the merchant $5.40 but then it will round up to the nearest dollar and add the change or difference ($0.60) to the App > The app will then convert the $0.60 to credits and display on the user's dashboard.USER REDEEMS CREDITS TO MAKE A PURCHASE:userA goes to the store and wants to make a purchase for $4.20 > userA has 0.60 credits on the app currently. > userA can redeem the credits and the app will convert the credits back into money ($0.60). > then userA can use their app credits and use the credit card on file to pay the remaining $3.60 for the transaction.OTHER FEATURES:userA does not have to redeem their credits they can let it build up.userA can also transfer or share credits with other users on the app.userA will have a dashboard to see the transaction statistics and how many credits etc...we will be adding more features on the app also later in other releases.*** BEFORE YOU CONTACT ME PLEASE GO TO [url removed, login to view]  to see how it works so you can get a better understanding of what they do and what it is. ***
title: Need React Native App Developers Build A Keep The Change APP.

desc: Software.1.	Get a sentence from the database.2.	Digital fingerprint the sentence.3.	Create a square code according the sentence.4.	Create a vocal signal according the sentence by using periodic wave.5.	Get appropriate pupil movement pattern that shows cognitive process.6.	Creating benchmark for valid intonation ( or matching percentage).7.	Creating benchmark for valid melody of sentences ( or matching percentage).User.8.	Show the generated square code on the screen ( display it according the length of vocal signal, 1 sec or 20 ms). (This rate will shrink according the evolution of the studies and at the end will be between 50ms and 20ms.)9.	Play the generated vocal signal.10.	Play the sentence.11.	Ask the user repeat the sentence.Software.12.	The software checks if movement of the pupils refer to a cognitive load by contracting and de-contracting.13.	The software checks if the intonation of the phoneme is referring the matching percentage.14.	The software checks if the melody of sentence is good according to the given speed references ( 220 phoneme/mn) and evaluate the matching percentage.15.	If all the conditions are ok or between % 65 and %100, we accept it as good and the software go to the next sentence.  (This rate will change according the evolution of the studies and at the end will be between %95 and %100.)16.	If those conditions doesn’t meet with the benchmarks.17.	The software will twice the time of reaction by dividing each phoneme and asking the user to repeat and will help also by showing visual info (short phonetic video which shows how to pronounce correctly).18.	The software will show the divided melody of sentence into segment so that the user could have access and ask the user to repeat and will help also by showing visual info.19.	The software will check the pupil reactions if it meets the benchmarks.20.	The software will loop until all conditions meets the demands.21.	Once the conditions are met, the software go to the next sentences.İn the course of the process the software will evaluate the users recalling preferences by pointing out which phoneme he has tendency to remember or by which visual effect he is more adopted and the software will use those preferences for the next work for inciting the user to recall rapidly.
title: Write an Android application

desc: I need an Android app.  I would like it designed and built.  Fighting DepressionCompany BackgroundTwo minds technology manages and runs the biggest platform for engineers in the world.  The company is running various programs and Apps for engaging with the users. The Apps by the company are most download engineering apps in the world.Two minds connect and partners with various companies and colleges in the education space providing the education material to the students. It also has a forum which hosts primarily user generated content. Millions of users visit the platform every year to download, read and interact with fellow users on the content.The company has stepped into app utility space and would like to develop a mobile app which would help fight depression in the society. Depression is not caused by a sudden sickness but caused by facing continuous difficulties over a period of time. These difficulties may include work stress, anxieties, troubles in personal life, etc. Like for many other illnesses, health professionals believe that if depression is treated while it is in the early stage, it would be more impactful. However, many times it is too late for people to realise that they are suffering from depression. Sometimes, it gets difficult for family and friends to provide support to people suffering as many does not disclose their medical condition thinking not to bother others. The company would like to develop an app which would pick the signs of depression at an early stage and take assistive measures.Project requirementsApplication SetupUpon installation, the app should record essential details from the user such as name, gender, time to bed, and next of kin. These details will be stored locally and user should be allowed to update them at a later stage.Rate your dayEvery day, the app should remind the user to rate their day at the time recorded for ‘time to bed’. The rating would be either excellent, good, average or bad. These ratings must be stored in a local database for analysis purpose. The reminder to rate your day can be snoozed if the user is busy during that time.AnalyticsAnalyse the data collected from the user and present a summary of how user’s life is progressing. The analysis can be compared on weekly, monthly and yearly basis. The analysis will help user predict the symptoms of depression at an early stage. The summary and comparison of the analysis must be shown in a graphical format.The project team should refer to these applications to get some idea about showing analytics – Sleep Cycle, WaterMinder and Seven.NotificationsIf a user rates five or more days as ‘bad’ in a row, the application should notify the next of kin listed in the app. The aim of this feature is to ensure that family and friends of the user are notified that he/she is feeling low so that they can provide some sort of support.Android Wear SupportOne of the challenge of this app is that users may not regularly rate their day. To maximize user inputs, the project team should develop a feature where those users using smart watches are notified to rate their day through watch. The users should be allowed to rate their day through smart watch app. This data should then be synced with Android mobile app for analysis.Design the UI with a modern and minimalist look with no more than 5 colours used. The project team is required to build an Android mobile app and Android Wear watch app (to facilitate the user input).
title: Mobile development
